ygData.subject: Re: A little drum data
ygData.msgSnippet: The L46 Bard with Selo s Drum will visibly outdistance the L50 with a MM drum. :) Ariell Thunderwolf, Karana
ygData.messageBody:
The L46 Bard with Selo's Drum will visibly outdistance the L50 with a MM
drum. :)

Ariell Thunderwolf, Karana
